header-text.zh: 这里是编辑器已安装的所有插件列表。如果想查看某个项目实际使用了哪些插件，可以在项目栏的项目名称文件夹右键，查看插件使用情况。
header-text.en: This is a list of all addons loaded by the editor. To view addons used by a specific project, use the Project Bar to view the used addons only.

install-error-message.zh: 无法安装插件。 检查浏览器控制台以获取详细信息
install-error-message.en: Failed to install the addon. Check the browser console for details.

uninstall-error-message.zh: 卸载插件时遇到了问题。

dev-addon-install.message.zh: 输入URL 在本地服务器(localhost) 可用的插件。
dev-addon-install.message.en: Enter the URL to an addon available on a local webserver (on localhost).

dev-install-failed.zh: 无法加载JSON插件。检查你的本地Web服务器是否运行并正确配置。检查浏览器控制台是否有错误。
dev-install-failed.en: Unable to load the addon JSON. Check your local web server is running and correctly configured. Check the browser console for errors.

install-confirmation.message.zh: 插件安装完成。重启 Construct 即可生效。
install-confirmation.message.en: Addon install finished. Restart Construct to start using any new addons.

uninstall-finished.message.zh: 插件已卸载。重启 Construct 即可生效。
uninstall-finished.message.en: The addon has been uninstalled. Restart Construct for changes to take effect.

restart-pending-message.zh: 重启 Construct 即可生效。
restart-pending-message.en: Restart Construct for addon changes to take effect.

dev-install-confirmation.zh: 重启 Construct 即可加载 '{0}' 插件。
dev-install-confirmation.en: Restart Construct to load the addon '{0}'.

install-min-version-error-message.zh: 无法安装此插件，它至少需要在 [a1]{0}[/a1] 版本运行，而您正在使用 [b]{1}[/b] 版本。
install-min-version-error-message.en: This addon cannot be installed because it requires a minimum version of [a1]{0}[/a1], and you are currently using [b]{1}[/b].

update-confirmation.message.zh: 插件更新完成。重启 Construct 使更改生效。
update-confirmation.message.en: Addon updates completed. Restart Construct for changes to take effect.

update-error-message.zh: 更新过程遇到问题。请尝试检查网络连接是否正常使用。
update-error-message.en: Failed to update addons. Try checking your Internet connection is working.

addon-updates-available-notification.mes.zh: 单击此通知，查看更多信息。
addon-updates-available-notification.mes.en: Click this notification to open the Addon Manager and view and install addon updates.

sdkv1-no-longer-supported.zh: 旧版插件已不再受支持 (SDK v1)
sdkv1-no-longer-supported.en: Legacy (SDK v1) addons are no longer supported

install-sdkv1-error-message.zh: 很遗憾通知您，由于此插件 (由 [i]{0}[/i] 开发的 [i]{1}[/i]) 版本过旧导致无法被安装。此插件版本被支持的最后一个发布版本是 [b]r449[/b] LTS 版本。请查看 [a1]LTS 发布页面[/a1]，或尝试联系插件开发者，获取此插件的最新版本。
install-sdkv1-error-message.en: The addon [i]{0}[/i] by [i]{1}[/i] is a legacy (SDK v1) addon which is no longer supported in this release of Construct and so cannot be installed. The last release that supports legacy addons is the [b]r449[/b] LTS release. See the [a1]LTS releases page[/a1], or contact the addon developer for an updated version of the addon.

description_en: The Addon Manager shows a detailed list of all addons (plugins, behaviors, effects and themes) available in Construct 3. It can be opened via Menu ► View ► Addon Manager . By default built-in addons are included in the list. Third-party addons appear at the top so you can easily see what you have installed. You can also uncheck Show built-in in the toolbar to reduce the list to only your installed addons. The search field also allows filtering the list to help you find an addon. You can find a l
